title: Governance & Compliance
caption: Manage risk effectively and stay on top of compliance
overview: At ZYCLYX, our services are dedicated to clients who need help in areas of corporate governance and effective compliance. Our team of experts will guide you to meet your unique business needs. The solutions are designed to help organizations identify, monitor, analyze and manage the issues while meeting the regulatory norms.
solTitle: Improve reputation by adhering to compliance requirements

services.title: SOC Automation
services.content: Security Operation Centers (SOC) have become part of every major organization in today's vulnerable times. We understand the importance of SOCs to identify, evaluate, and respond to cyber-attacks. Our SOC Automation arms your organization with tools for much more streamlined and highly effective defense. It acts like a well-equipped army which is ready, round-the-clock, to detect and address potential breaches

services.title: Forensic Services / Incident Response
services.content: We are here to support the Forensic services with the process of detecting, investigating, documenting, collecting, processing and analyzing any computer-related evidence of law enforcement investigations or criminal fraud. While our Incident response team comprises experts when it comes to managing the security breach or cyber attack. Our automation is aimed to limit the damage while reducing your time and cost of recovery.

services.title: Compliance Assessment
services.content: Our team is here to analyze any discrepancies by studying the differences between your current control system and actual requirements. As it is not part of risk assessment, the identified gaps may or may not correlate with exposure to risk.

services.title: Implement (SIEM)
services.content: We use the best network and hardware applications for our Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) services. These applications generate a real-time analysis of the threats and security warnings. It also provides a comparison between different events and warnings while managing the storage, processing, analysing and reporting of various security data.

services.title: Vulnerability Assessment / Pen Test / RED
services.content: As part of Vulnerability assessment we define, detect, classify and prioritize the vulnerabilities encountered by the computer systems, software and network infrastructure. We make an effort to convey the required knowledge to help your organization to recognize and react appropriately to these threats. During penetration testing ( Pen test) our team of cyber analysts simulates a cyber attack on the computer systems to check for bugs that can be exploited.
